title: Love Island Australia's Sam Withers almost starred on Married At First Sight
text:
He's the Melbourne-based DJ currently looking for love on reality TV.

But before appearing on Love Island Australia, Sam Withers was lined up to star in another Channel Nine reality show, Married At First Sight.

According to New Idea, the 28-year-old was locked in for the upcoming season and had already filmed pre-wedding segments.

Proof he's only after fame? Love Island Australia's Sam Withers (pictured) almost starred on Married At First Sight... but was DUMPED by his bride at the last minute

But Sam's wedding never went ahead because 'the girl he was matched with pulled out at the eleventh hour,' according to a source.

The insider added: 'Apparently she had just had a change of heart on the big day.'

With producers unable to find him another suitable match at such short notice, they decided to cast him on Love Island instead.

In the spotlight: According to New Idea, the 28-year-old was locked in for the upcoming season of MAFS and had already filmed pre-wedding segments

Sam kicked off his career as a DJ in 2009 and has supported the likes of Justin Bieber, Martin Garrix and Avicii.

He is currently paired with 23-year-old Brisbane model Cynthia Taylu in the villa.

Before jetting off to Fiji, Sam revealed he was very picky and has struggled to find someone who is 'full girlfriend material'.

Jilted! But Sam's wedding never went ahead because 'the girl he was matched with pulled out at the eleventh hour,' according to a source

The part-time model explained that he's looking for a woman who is assertive but still wants a family life.

He also wants to date someone outside of the nightclub industry.

Love Island Australia continues Monday at 8:40pm on Channel Nine
description: Before appearing on Love Island Australia, Sam Withers was lined up to star in another Channel Nine reality show, Married At First Sight
authors: Ali Daher For Daily Mail Australia
